author: mandrenguyen
body:
#### PR description:

Adds Run3_PbPb to run PbPb reconstruction with 2021 conditions.  This era contains the minimal modifications to produce a running workflow.  It uses the same modifiers as in the Run2_2018_pp_on_AA era. 


#### PR validation:

I tested workflow 158.1, substituting in the following flags:
--beamspot Run3RoundOptics25ns13TeVLowSigmaZ
--era Run3_PbPb
--conditions auto:phase1_2021_realistic
as well as replacing the HLT menu with HLT@fake2

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
title: Minimal era for Run 3 PbPb
